item.title: How I do backup my server using Dropbox headless
item.description: I have experienced a disaster on my web server a few days ago. While trying to remove one of my dev databases, I have removed the production database accidentally. I was extremely lucky because I duplicated production database to the local one to test a python script and I have all my web app’s content in the GIT history which you shouldn’t. Because it is not the best practice to put web app’s content to the VCS.
